name: PANDAS
description:
Pre-Alpha is ready!

- Map selecting not working, because there aren't maps (only the jungle)

- Only playable with two players and two PS4 controllers

- No skins for the player, coming soon!

- No audio, sorry, it is coming in the alpha version

To Download:

1. Go to itch.io/app

2. Download it, it is the launcher for games

3. Log in or sign up in the window, that you see if you start it first

4. Go to ws-games.itch.io/pandas in the explore tab

5. Download it

6. Press 'Launch' to start playing!
